text.text: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
Throughout life people will make you mad, disrespect you and treat you bad. Let God deal with the things they do, cause hate in your heart will consume you too.
Life is a song - sing it. Life is a game - play it. Life is a challenge - meet it. Life is a dream - realize it. Life is a sacrifice - offer it. Life is love - enjoy it.
A life spent making mistakes is not only more honorable, but more useful than a life spent doing nothing.
Never be bullied into silence. Never allow yourself to be made a victim. Accept no one's definition of your life; define yourself.
When I stand before God at the end of my life, I would hope that I would not have a single bit of talent left, and could say, 'I used everything you gave me'.
Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.
Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
Don't go around saying the world owes you a living. The world owes you nothing. It was here first.
The truth is you don't know what is going to happen tomorrow. Life is a crazy ride, and nothing is guaranteed.
Life is a dream for the wise, a game for the fool, a comedy for the rich, a tragedy for the poor.
You will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of. You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life.
Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or present are certain to miss the future.

How far you go in life depends on your being tender with the young, compassionate with the aged, sympathetic with the striving and tolerant of the weak and strong. Because someday in your life you will have been all of these.
Open your eyes, look within. Are you satisfied with the life you're living?
All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make the better.
My formula for living is quite simple. I get up in the morning and I go to bed at night. In between, I occupy myself as best I can.
Life is a series of natural and spontaneous changes. Don't resist them - that only creates sorrow. Let reality be reality. Let things flow naturally forward in whatever way they like.
I still find each day too short for all the thoughts I want to think, all the walks I want to take, all the books I want to read, and all the friends I want to see.
Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.
Life is what happens while you are busy making other plans.
A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
The most important thing is to enjoy your life - to be happy - it's all that matters.
I have a simple philosophy: Fill what's empty. Empty what's full. Scratch where it itches.
We must let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us.
Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
Our life always expresses the result of our dominant thoughts.

This life, which had been the tomb of his virtue and of his honour, is but a walking shadow; a poor player, that struts and frets his hour upon the stage, and then is heard no more: it is a tale told by an idiot, full of sound and fury, signifying nothing.
Good friends, good books and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life.
If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.
Any idiot can face a crisis - it's day to day living that wears you out.
I arise in the morning torn between a desire to improve the world and a desire to enjoy the world. This makes it hard to plan the day.

I went to the woods because I wished to live deliberately, to front only the essential facts of life, and see if I could not learn what it had to teach, and not, when I came to die, discover that I had not lived.
He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
Every man dies. Not every man really lives.
To live a pure unselfish life, one must count nothing as one's own in the midst of abundance.
All the art of living lies in a fine mingling of letting go and holding on.

We need to give each other the space to grow, to be ourselves, to exercise our diversity. We need to give each other space so that we may both give and receive such beautiful things as ideas, openness, dignity, joy, healing, and inclusion.
The true secret of happiness lies in taking a genuine interest in all the details of daily life.
When we remember we are all mad, the mysteries disappear and life stands explained.
Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.
Remember when life's path is steep to keep your mind even.
Life is like dancing. If we have a big floor, many people will dance. Some will get angry when the rhythm changes. But life is changing all the time.
A man sooner or later discovers that he is the master-gardener of his soul, the director of his life.
I slept and dreamt that life was joy. I awoke and saw that life was service. I acted and behold, service was joy.
The price of anything is the amount of life you exchange for it.
Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
It is not length of life, but depth of life.
The privilege of a lifetime is being who you are.
We must be willing to let go of the life we have planned, so as to have the life that is waiting for us.
A baby is God's opinion that life should go on.
My life is my message.
When life is too easy for us, we must beware or we may not be ready to meet the blows which sooner or later come to everyone, rich or poor.
Life is 10 percent what you make it, and 90 percent how you take it.
Once you say you're going to settle for second, that's what happens to you in life.
Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
There are three constants in life... change, choice and principles.
Life is far too important a thing ever to talk seriously about.
Here is the test to find whether your mission on Earth is finished: if you're alive, it isn't.
Beware the barrenness of a busy life.
If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
Life loves the liver of it.
Don't go through life, grow through life.
I don't believe people are looking for the meaning of life as much as they are looking for the experience of being alive.
I love those who yearn for the impossible.
The only disability in life is a bad attitude.
A person will sometimes devote all his life to the development of one part of his body - the wishbone.
Our life is what our thoughts make it.
What we think determines what happens to us, so if we want to change our lives, we need to stretch our minds.
With the past, I have nothing to do; nor with the future. I live now.
Don't let life discourage you; everyone who got where he is had to begin where he was.
Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.
The shoe that fits one person pinches another; there is no recipe for living that suits all cases.
The courage of life is often a less dramatic spectacle than the courage of a final moment; but it is no less a magnificent mixture of triumph and tragedy.
It's all about quality of life and finding a happy balance between work and friends and family.
Life consists not in holding good cards but in playing those you hold well.

What if you gave someone a gift, and they neglected to thank you for it - would you be likely to give them another? Life is the same way. In order to attract more of the blessings that life has to offer, you must truly appreciate what you already have.
Every creature is better alive than dead, men and moose and pine trees, and he who understands it aright will rather preserve its life than destroy it.

If you live long enough, you'll make mistakes. But if you learn from them, you'll be a better person. It's how you handle adversity, not how it affects you. The main thing is never quit, never quit, never quit.
May you live all the days of your life.
Life consists in what a man is thinking of all day.
Life is a series of collisions with the future; it is not the sum of what we have been, but what we yearn to be.
Use your health, even to the point of wearing it out. That is what it is for. Spend all you have before you die; do not outlive yourself.
Everything has been figured out, except how to live.
Not life, but good life, is to be chiefly valued.
The story of life is quicker then the blink of an eye, the story of love is hello, goodbye.
A life is not important except in the impact it has on other lives.
I do not regret one moment of my life.
I love life because what more is there?
When I hear somebody sigh, 'Life is hard,' I am always tempted to ask, 'Compared to what?'
Doing what you love is the cornerstone of having abundance in your life.
Life becomes harder for us when we live for others, but it also becomes richer and happier.
Who will tell whether one happy moment of love or the joy of breathing or walking on a bright morning and smelling the fresh air, is not worth all the suffering and effort which life implies.
I think I've discovered the secret of life - you just hang around until you get used to it.
Life is a tragedy when seen in close-up, but a comedy in long-shot.
Life does not cease to be funny when people die any more than it ceases to be serious when people laugh.
The true object of all human life is play. Earth is a task garden; heaven is a playground.
I have found that if you love life, life will love you back.
The art of living is more like wrestling than dancing.
Most people have never learned that one of the main aims in life is to enjoy it.
I look back on my life like a good day's work, it was done and I am satisfied with it.
A well-spent day brings happy sleep.
To affect the quality of the day, that is the highest of arts.
The aim of life is to live, and to live means to be aware, joyously, drunkenly, serenely, divinely aware.
Everything in life is luck.
The good life is one inspired by love and guided by knowledge.
The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes.
One way to get the most out of life is to look upon it as an adventure.

It's only when we truly know and understand that we have a limited time on earth - and that we have no way of knowing when our time is up, we will then begin to live each day to the fullest, as if it was the only one we had.
Life in abundance comes only through great love.
People living deeply have no fear of death.
Life is ten percent what happens to you and ninety percent how you respond to it.
What is important in life is life, and not the result of life.
The chief danger in life is that you may take too many precautions.
An aim in life is the only fortune worth finding.
Life must be lived as play.
There is only one difference between a long life and a good dinner: that, in the dinner, the sweets come last.
You have succeeded in life when all you really want is only what you really need.

Look, I don't want to wax philosophic, but I will say that if you're alive you've got to flap your arms and legs, you've got to jump around a lot, for life is the very opposite of death, and therefore you must at very least think noisy and colorfully, or you're not alive.
Begin at once to live, and count each separate day as a separate life.
Maybe all one can do is hope to end up with the right regrets.
Life is a succession of moments, to live each one is to succeed.
Get correct views of life, and learn to see the world in its true light. It will enable you to live pleasantly, to do good, and, when summoned away, to leave without regret.
A healthful hunger for a great idea is the beauty and blessedness of life.
Our business in life is not to succeed, but to continue to fail in good spirits.
Life is a long lesson in humility.
While we are postponing, life speeds by.
Life's a fight. It's a good fight of faith.
While there's life, there's hope.
Kindness, I've discovered, is everything in life.
Fortunately analysis is not the only way to resolve inner conflicts. Life itself still remains a very effective therapist.
The great use of life is to spend it for something that will outlast it.
Life appears to me too short to be spent in nursing animosity, or registering wrongs.
To change ones life: Start immediately. Do it flamboyantly.
This life is worth living, we can say, since it is what we make it.
The greatest pleasure of life is love.
Unbeing dead isn't being alive.
The purpose of life is a life of purpose.
Life is pleasant. Death is peaceful. It's the transition that's troublesome.
Life is half spent before we know what it is.
To live is to change, and to be perfect is to have changed often.
We are all here for a spell, get all the good laughs you can.
A chain is no stronger than its weakest link, and life is after all a chain.
Life will always be to a large extent what we ourselves make it.
Life is what we make it, always has been, always will be.
Life's like a play: it's not the length, but the excellence of the acting that matters.
Life is too short to work so hard.
Life isn't a matter of milestones, but of moments.
Life well spent is long.
The art of life is to know how to enjoy a little and to endure very much.
There is just one life for each of us: our own.
The basic fact about human existence is not that it is a tragedy, but that it is a bore. It is not so much a war as an endless standing in line.
True life is lived when tiny changes occur.
Nearly all the best things that came to me in life have been unexpected, unplanned by me.
We are here to add what we can to life, not to get what we can from life.
Life is never easy for those who dream.
You're only here for a short visit. Don't hurry, don't worry. And be sure to smell the flowers along the way.
We live in the world when we love it.
Life is wasted on the living.
The most exhausting thing in life is being insincere.
We can't plan life. All we can do is be available for it.
I did not direct my life. I didn't design it. I never made decisions. Things always came up and made them for me. That's what life is.
The indispensable first step to getting the things you want out of life is this: decide what you want.
Life has meaning only if one barters it day by day for something other than itself.
What a wonderful life I've had! I only wish I'd realized it sooner.
Seventy percent of success in life is showing up.
Life is something to do when you can't get to sleep.
Give me the luxuries of life and I will willingly do without the necessities.
For the happiest life, days should be rigorously planned, nights left open to chance.
There is no wealth but life.
The main facts in human life are five: birth, food, sleep, love and death.
Life is largely a matter of expectation.
To live is so startling it leaves little time for anything else.
Life is not an exact science, it is an art.
I take a simple view of life. It is keep your eyes open and get on with it.
No man is a failure who is enjoying life.
Life is a moderately good play with a badly written third act.
The man who has no inner-life is a slave to his surroundings.
Wrong life cannot be lived rightly.
Our entire life - consists ultimately in accepting ourselves as we are.
To me, if life boils down to one thing, it's movement. To live is to keep moving.
Life is the art of drawing sufficient conclusions from insufficient premises.
I take care of my flowers and my cats. And enjoy food. And that's living.
Life is like a trumpet - if you don't put anything into it, you don't get anything out of it.
Every man regards his own life as the New Year's Eve of time.
Life is a tide; float on it. Go down with it and go up with it, but be detached. Then it is not difficult.
You can preach a better sermon with your life than with your lips.
Life is anything that dies when you stomp on it.
Human life is as evanescent as the morning dew or a flash of lightning.
To be free is to have achieved your life.
My life is every moment of my life. It is not a culmination of the past.
To know nothing is the happiest life.
Variety's the very spice of life, That gives it all its flavor.
Life is painting a picture, not doing a sum.
The less routine the more life.
Life itself is the proper binge.
Life is but thought.
How sweet it is!
Life is a culmination of the past, an awareness of the present, an indication of a future beyond knowledge, the quality that gives a touch of divinity to matter.
Any life is made up of a single moment, the moment in which a man finds out, once and for all, who he is.
The Indian Summer of life should be a little sunny and a little sad, like the season, and infinite in wealth and depth of tone, but never hustled.
You don't have to be the Dalai Lama to tell people that life's about change.
What we play is life.
Life is very short and what we have to do must be done in the now.
Life is a lot like jazz... it's best when you improvise.
The whole secret of life is to be interested in one thing profoundly and in a thousand things well.
We cannot put off living until we are ready.
Life ought to be a struggle of desire toward adventures whose nobility will fertilize the soul.
Life is much shorter than I imagined it to be.
Take care of your life and the Lord will take care of your death.
Wars and elections are both too big and too small to matter in the long run. The daily work - that goes on, it adds up.
Life is made up of sobs, sniffles, and smiles, with sniffles predominating.
Life is a great sunrise. I do not see why death should not be an even greater one.
Not a shred of evidence exists in favor of the idea that life is serious.
Life has a higher end, than to be amused.
The fear of life is the favorite disease of the 20th century.
The person lives twice who lives the first life well.
Unrest of spirit is a mark of life.
Growth is the only evidence of life.
Life itself still remains a very effective therapist.
I had no blood relatives till I made some.
I have inspiration and feelings of being alive most every day I live.
Conduct is three-fourths of our life and its largest concern.
Mindfulness is about love and loving life. When you cultivate this love, it gives you clarity and compassion for life, and your actions happen in accordance with that.
Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead.
I believe that if life gives you lemons, you should make lemonade... And try to find somebody whose life has given them vodka, and have a party.
Where there is love there is life.
If you don't design your own life plan, chances are you'll fall into someone else's plan. And guess what they have planned for you? Not much.
Life is a canvas of many strokes where shades from different palettes meet into a picture so concrete that some forget it is their own, so become framed themselves.
I hated every minute of training, but I said, 'Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.'

Life is one big road with lots of signs. So when you riding through the ruts, don't complicate your mind. Flee from hate, mischief and jealousy. Don't bury your thoughts, put your vision to reality. Wake Up and Live!

I've missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
You have enemies? Good. That means you've stood up for something, sometime in your life.

In everyone's life, at some time, our inner fire goes out. It is then burst into flame by an encounter with another human being. We should all be thankful for those people who rekindle the inner spirit.
Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.

Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma - which is living with the results of other people's thinking. Don't let the noise of others' opinions drown out your own inner voice. And most important, have the courage to follow your heart and intuition.

Take up one idea. Make that one idea your life - think of it, dream of it, live on that idea. Let the brain, muscles, nerves, every part of your body, be full of that idea, and just leave every other idea alone. This is the way to success.
In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards.
Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
Choosing to be positive and having a grateful attitude is going to determine how you're going to live your life.
We love life, not because we are used to living but because we are used to loving.
Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky.
There is no passion to be found playing small - in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.

Bad things do happen; how I respond to them defines my character and the quality of my life. I can choose to sit in perpetual sadness, immobilized by the gravity of my loss, or I can choose to rise from the pain and treasure the most precious gift I have - life itself.
Whatever your life's work is, do it well. A man should do his job so well that the living, the dead, and the unborn could do it no better.
Every moment and every event of every man's life on earth plants something in his soul.
I've failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.
Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.

For the past 33 years, I have looked in the mirror every morning and asked myself: 'If today were the last day of my life, would I want to do what I am about to do today?' And whenever the answer has been 'No' for too many days in a row, I know I need to change something.
Love is our true destiny. We do not find the meaning of life by ourselves alone - we find it with another.
Life's most persistent and urgent question is, 'What are you doing for others?'
I would rather live my life as if there is a God and die to find out there isn't, than live as if there isn't and to die to find out that there is.
I cannot even imagine where I would be today were it not for that handful of friends who have given me a heart full of joy. Let's face it, friends make life a lot more fun.
The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other's life.
My mother was the most beautiful woman I ever saw. All I am I owe to my mother. I attribute all my success in life to the moral, intellectual and physical education I received from her.
God gave us the gift of life; it is up to us to give ourselves the gift of living well.
Music is a moral law. It gives soul to the universe, wings to the mind, flight to the imagination, and charm and gaiety to life and to everything.
Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.
I remember my mother's prayers and they have always followed me. They have clung to me all my life.
Your living is determined not so much by what life brings to you as by the attitude you bring to life; not so much by what happens to you as by the way your mind looks at what happens.
Without music, life would be a mistake.
Imagination is everything. It is the preview of life's coming attractions.
The devil has put a penalty on all things we enjoy in life. Either we suffer in health or we suffer in soul or we get fat.
Character develops itself in the stream of life.
Just as a candle cannot burn without fire, men cannot live without a spiritual life.
Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome.
Life is a mirror and will reflect back to the thinker what he thinks into it.
Your children are not your children. They are the sons and daughters of Life's longing for itself. They came through you but not from you and though they are with you yet they belong not to you.
I believe that a simple and unassuming manner of life is best for everyone, best both for the body and the mind.

When you rise in the morning, give thanks for the light, for your life, for your strength. Give thanks for your food and for the joy of living. If you see no reason to give thanks, the fault lies in yourself.
To be idle is a short road to death and to be diligent is a way of life; foolish people are idle, wise people are diligent.
We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
Of life's two chief prizes, beauty and truth, I found the first in a loving heart and the second in a laborer's hand.

All life demands struggle. Those who have everything given to them become lazy, selfish, and insensitive to the real values of life. The very striving and hard work that we so constantly try to avoid is the major building block in the person we are today.
The quality, not the longevity, of one's life is what is important.

Security is mostly a superstition. It does not exist in nature, nor do the children of men as a whole experience it. Avoiding danger is no safer in the long run than outright exposure. Life is either a daring adventure, or nothing.

Even a happy life cannot be without a measure of darkness, and the word happy would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness. It is far better take things as they come along with patience and equanimity.
If you can dream it, then you can achieve it. You will get all you want in life if you help enough other people get what they want.
Imagine all the people living life in peace. You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one. I hope someday you'll join us, and the world will be as one.

I like nonsense, it wakes up the brain cells. Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living, it's a way of looking at life through the wrong end of a telescope. Which is what I do, and that enables you to laugh at life's realities.
Without deep reflection one knows from daily life that one exists for other people.

Learn to enjoy every minute of your life. Be happy now. Don't wait for something outside of yourself to make you happy in the future. Think how really precious is the time you have to spend, whether it's at work or with your family. Every minute should be enjoyed and savored.
The monotony and solitude of a quiet life stimulates the creative mind.
I've learned that you shouldn't go through life with a catcher's mitt on both hands; you need to be able to throw something back.

Gratitude unlocks the fullness of life. It turns what we have into enough, and more. It turns denial into acceptance, chaos to order, confusion to clarity. It can turn a meal into a feast, a house into a home, a stranger into a friend.
Life has its own hidden forces which you can only discover by living.
The fear of death follows from the fear of life. A man who lives fully is prepared to die at any time.

I'm not going to change the way I look or the way I feel to conform to anything. I've always been a freak. So I've been a freak all my life and I have to live with that, you know. I'm one of those people.
But friendship is precious, not only in the shade, but in the sunshine of life, and thanks to a benevolent arrangement the greater part of life is sunshine.
All changes, even the most longed for, have their melancholy; for what we leave behind us is a part of ourselves; we must die to one life before we can enter another.
To succeed in life, you need two things: ignorance and confidence.
There is nothing more tragic than to find an individual bogged down in the length of life, devoid of breadth.

Our greatest happiness does not depend on the condition of life in which chance has placed us, but is always the result of a good conscience, good health, occupation, and freedom in all just pursuits.

Again, you can't connect the dots looking forward; you can only connect them looking backwards. So you have to trust that the dots will somehow connect in your future. You have to trust in something - your gut, destiny, life, karma, whatever. This approach has never let me down, and it has made all the difference in my life.
The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
When I was young I thought that money was the most important thing in life; now that I am old I know that it is.

You can't stop loving or wanting to love because when its right it's the best thing in the world. When you're in a relationship and its good, even if nothing else in your life is right, you feel like your whole world is complete.

If you always put limit on everything you do, physical or anything else. It will spread into your work and into your life. There are no limits. There are only plateaus, and you must not stay there, you must go beyond them.
The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
So long as the memory of certain beloved friends lives in my heart, I shall say that life is good.
I love being married. It's so great to find that one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it.
Three grand essentials to happiness in this life are something to do, something to love, and something to hope for.
He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.
The only real failure in life is not to be true to the best one knows.

Beginning today, treat everyone you meet as if they were going to be dead by midnight. Extend to them all the care, kindness and understanding you can muster, and do it with no thought of any reward. Your life will never be the same again.
Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty. Anyone who keeps learning stays young. The greatest thing in life is to keep your mind young.
Love is life. And if you miss love, you miss life.
Property is intended to serve life, and no matter how much we surround it with rights and respect, it has no personal being. It is part of the earth man walks on. It is not man.

Today I choose life. Every morning when I wake up I can choose joy, happiness, negativity, pain... To feel the freedom that comes from being able to continue to make mistakes and choices - today I choose to feel life, not to deny my humanity but embrace it.
Without health life is not life; it is only a state of langour and suffering - an image of death.

Just as treasures are uncovered from the earth, so virtue appears from good deeds, and wisdom appears from a pure and peaceful mind. To walk safely through the maze of human life, one needs the light of wisdom and the guidance of virtue.
Learning to trust is one of life's most difficult tasks.
People fear death even more than pain. It's strange that they fear death. Life hurts a lot more than death. At the point of death, the pain is over. Yeah, I guess it is a friend.
There are only two tragedies in life: one is not getting what one wants, and the other is getting it.
True wisdom comes to each of us when we realize how little we understand about life, ourselves, and the world around us.
Today, more than ever before, life must be characterized by a sense of Universal responsibility, not only nation to nation and human to human, but also human to other forms of life.
All my life I have tried to pluck a thistle and plant a flower wherever the flower would grow in thought and mind.

Make it a habit to tell people thank you. To express your appreciation, sincerely and without the expectation of anything in return. Truly appreciate those around you, and you'll soon find many others around you. Truly appreciate life, and you'll find that you have more of it.
There is only one thing in life worse than being talked about, and that is not being talked about.

The best years of your life are the ones in which you decide your problems are your own. You do not blame them on your mother, the ecology, or the president. You realize that you control your own destiny.
